column5: The year started off with a bang! My wife Anna and I had our first baby on Jan. 12th. They are a constant reminder of why life is amazing.     Yes, the addition of Eliana meant less angling for me but I still managed to get out to satisfy the itch. In years past Bass and Pike occupied most of my days but this year I chose to mix it up to target a larger variety of species.   March - May  One of many intruders while in the pursuit of STEEL           Highdrifter with some Spring Steel.     June - Sept  In July, I purchased my first fly rod/reel combo. It's too bad I couldn't find the time to use it in prime resident trout streams. To fill the void, I put it to use in the not so nice river right behind my place to target Carp. Before I got the fly set up, I was able to take the light action spinning gear to some nice water and connected with a few smaller fish.          In August, Highdrifter and myself headed up to Nipissing to fish in extremely difficult conditions. We did manage a couple though...         Then there was the fall...What an awesome couple months it was.  My buddy Dan's sweet Brown! Dan, you are a great angler and an even better friend and mentor.     Another solid fishing partner.             Now on to playing some basketball for a couple months to get this butt in shape.  Thanks for taking the time. All the best during the holidays and in 2011!  Laszlo
congratz to u and ur family.. cute baby... and ur fishing venture was great.. thnx for sharing

great report, and pictures. the best picture is the first one. and incase you didnt notice, Eliana has the car keys in her hand already...LOL We know what she will be getting on her 16th birthday!!!!!!
Thanks for sharing your 2010 review Lasz Congratulations to the both of you on your new addition    she's a keeper and a real cutie Leechman
congrats !!!! You are one lucky dude. Enjoy the good life my friend and Merry Christmas to you and your lovely familly   Paul
All beauties brother..  eliana is absolutely gorgeous, just like her mom..  Looking forward to another great year!  Hope you can join me on the slopes!!  And a merry Christmas to you and yours.
Sounds like you've had a great year fishing, and more importantly with your family. Congrats.  Oh, I've heard those mooneyes like you got can be a blast with the fly gear.....
Nice stuff. Thanks for sharing! I love the colours of the reflection on the second last picture
How time fly's eh Laz. I still love the picture of the smiling buck

Merry Christmas to you too buddy. All the best in the new year.  I'm really happy we made that early morning mission to Loyalist in fall of 09. It was a conduit to many more adventures with a lot more to come.
beautiful family Laz...some pretty darn nice fish too...  Merry Christmas and all the best for tight lines in the new year!!!  Cheers
Fine account of a pretty special year in fishing but more so with family.  Good show.  Enjoy 11.
Looks like you had a great year. Congrats and good luck in 2011
